definition: 1. One who, or that which, whistles, or produces or a whistling sound. 2. (Zoöl.) (a) The ring ousel. (b) The widgeon. [Prov. Eng.] (c) The golden-eye. (d) The golden plover and the gray plover. 3. (Zoöl.)  The hoary, or northern, marmot (Arctomys pruinosus). 4. (Zoöl.)  The whistlefish.
